epics.name: User Authentication and Registration
epics.description: Both requesters and tutors register and log in to the system. It includes registration form, validation, and OAuth integration.
epics.acceptanceCriteria: User registration and login functionalities adequately tested.
epics.technicalNotes: Implement password hashing; store OAuth tokens; create database indexes.

epics.name: Requester Functionality
epics.description: Requesters create tuition requests, view, search for tutors, and send offers.
epics.acceptanceCriteria: All forms and search functionalities validated.
epics.technicalNotes: Implement client-side validation, geolocation API integration, and optimized database queries.

epics.name: Tutor Functionality
epics.description: Tutors create their profiles, view offers, and accept them to secure tuition opportunities.
epics.acceptanceCriteria: Profile creation and offer management functionalities tested.
epics.technicalNotes: Implement secure file uploads; scheduled tasks for recalculating expertise levels.

epics.name: Notification System
epics.description: System sends notifications to tutors about new offers and updates offer statuses.
epics.acceptanceCriteria: Background service for notification works as expected.
epics.technicalNotes: Implement message queue; create email templates; configure monitoring and retry mechanisms.

epics.name: Match-making System
epics.description: Matches requesters with tutors based on various criteria such as education level, subjects, fee, and expertise.
epics.acceptanceCriteria: Matching algorithm returns accurate and relevant results.
epics.technicalNotes: Implement efficient indexing, caching mechanisms, and design for horizontal scaling.
